title: Does PES offer a dual degree?
content: I scored very bad in PESSAT and might get ECE in Electronic city branch. I wanted to know if PES has and dual degree course like Btech in mathematics and computer science?

comments.body: No. it has integrated b.tech-masters in one of the engineering fields. i think the masters can be done in the same field as minors (if you have taken one). not sure tho, check [pes.edu](https://pes.edu) for more details
